name: Deep Sea Sentry
effectText: If this card is sent to the GY to activate a WATER monster's effect: You can make your opponent banish 1 card from their hand face-up, until the End Phase. If this card is Special Summoned: You can send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the GY, then target 1 Level 4 or lower WATER monster in your GY, except "Deep Sea Sentry"; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Deep Sea Sentry" once per turn.
